dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2951 IH: JAWS Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Farenthold introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit foreign assistance to countries that do not prohibit shark finning in the territorial waters of the country or the importation, sale, or possession of shark fins obtained as a result of shark finning.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Justice Attributed to Wounded Sharks Act or JAWS Act.

section.header: Prohibition on foreign assistance to countries that do not prohibit shark finning in the territorial waters of the country or the importation, sale, or possession of shark fins obtained as a result of shark finning

subsection.text: No funds available to any Federal department or agency may be used to provide assistance to a country if the President determines that the country does not prohibit the following:

paragraph.text: Shark finning in the territorial waters of the country.
The importation, sale, or possession of shark fins obtained as a result of shark finning.

subsection.text: In this section, the term shark finning has the meaning given the term in section 9 of the Shark Finning Prohibition Act (16 U.S.C. 1822 note).

This Act takes effect on the date of the enactment of this Act and applies with respect to funds available to a Federal department or agency beginning on or after the date that is 90 days after such date of enactment.
